meanings.sent1: The kickers on the soccer team practice every day.
meanings.sent2: The kicker scored a goal during the match.
meanings.sent3: The kickers had a friendly competition to see who could kick the ball the farthest.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the best kicker in the league.
meanings.sent5: The coach praised the kickers for their strong kicks.

meanings.definition: A device used to start a motorcycle or small engine.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic used the kickers to start the engine.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to use the kicker gently to avoid damaging the engine.
meanings.sent3: The kickers made starting the motorcycle so much easier.
meanings.sent4: He relied on the kicker to get his old motorcycle running.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the kicker engaging signaled the start of the engine.

meanings.definition: A type of shoe with a rounded toe.
meanings.sent1: She wore her favorite kickers to the party.
meanings.sent2: The new kickers she bought were comfortable for walking.
meanings.sent3: His bright red kickers stood out among the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The kickers matched perfectly with her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The kickers protected her feet during the long walk.
